Patient has Amnesia
/es/ ALBERT DAVIS

Dependence on Cane
/es/ ALBERT DAVIS
Signed: 12/12/2016 16:02

LOCAL TITLE: GOALS DATE OF NOTE: DEC 12,2016@14:40ENTRY DATE: DEC 12,2016@14:40:29 AUTHOR: DAVIS,ALBERT EXP COSIGNER: URGENCY:STATUS: COMPLETED
a. Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks. b. Need to gain more energy to do regular activities.
/es/ ALBERT DAVIS
Signed: 12/12/2016 14:48
CHEMISTRY: Urinalysis macro (dipstick) panel Date: DEC 19,2016 Urgency: ROUTINE

LOCAL TITLE: FUTURE APPOINTMENTS & REFERRALS DATE OF NOTE: DEC 12,2016@09:35ENTRY DATE: DEC 12,2016@15:56:57 AUTHOR: DAVIS,ALBERT EXP COSIGNER: URGENCY:STATUS: COMPLETED
Ms Alice Newman is being referred to Community Health Hospitals Inpatient facility because of the high fever noticed and suspected Anemia.
/es/ ALBERT DAVIS
Signed: 12/12/2016 15:58

LOCAL TITLE: ASSESSMENT DATE OF NOTE: DEC 12,2016@14:33ENTRY DATE: DEC 12,2016@14:33:36 AUTHOR: DAVIS,ALBERT EXP COSIGNER: URGENCY:STATUS: COMPLETED
i. The patient was found to have fever and Dr Davis is suspecting Anemia based on the patient history. So Dr Davis asked the patient to closely monitor the temperature and blood pressue and get admitted to Community Health Hospitals if the fever does not subside withing a day.
/es/ ALBERT DAVIS
Signed: 12/12/2016 14:35
Fever, SNOMED: 386661006, Onset Date: 12/12/2016, Status: Active
